Emerging growth company &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section 13(a) of the Exchange Act. &#9744; &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; Item 8.01 Other Events. &#160; On August 11, 2020, Tesla, Inc. issued a press release announcing that its board of directors has declared a five-for-one split of Tesla&#8217;s common stock in the form of a stock dividend. A copy of this press release is filed as&#160;Exhibit 99.1 to this Current Report on Form 8-K and is incorporated herein by reference. &#160; Item&#160;9.01 Financial Statements and Exhibits. &#160; (d) Exhibits. &#160; Exhibit&#160;No. &#160; Description &#160; &#160; 99.1 &#160; Press Release of Tesla, Inc., dated August 11, 2020 . 104 &#160; Cover Page Interactive Data File (embedded within the Inline XBRL document). &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; SIGNATURES Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned hereunto duly authorized. &#160; &#160; &#160; TESLA, INC. &#160; &#160; &#160; By: &#160; /s/ Zachary J.
